Enums/EventType.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: When a channel was deleted (when watching the channel ).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: When a user status changes, e.g. online, offline, away (when subscribed to the user status ).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: When a user stops watching a channel (when watching the channel ).

Enums/EventType.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: When a user was updated (when subscribed to the user status ).

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A callback type to open a chat view controller with a given message reference.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: localNotificationContent
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A callback to create a custom local notification for a new message when the app in the background.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: showNewMessage
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A callback to open a chat view controller with a given message id and channel id.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: clearApplicationIconBadgeNumberOnAppActive
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Enablde clearing application icon badge number when app become active.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: showIfNeeded(newMessage:in:)
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Show a notification with a given message from a channel if the app in the background.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: show(newMessage:in:)
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Show a notification with a given message from a channel.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: parseMessageReference(notificationResponse:)
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Parse a notification response user info for a message reference.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: reactionsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: If users are allowed to add reactions to messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: typingEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls if typing indicators are shown. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: readEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls whether the chat shows how far youve read. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: repliesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Enables message threads and replies. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: searchEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls if messages should be searchable (this is a premium feature). Disabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: mutesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to mute other users. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: flagsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to flag messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: messageRetention
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: A number of days or infinite. Infinite by default.

Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:14S.name: cid
Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:14S.abstract: A combination of channel id and type.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: members
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: A list of user ids of the channel members.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: fetch(pagination:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Fetch channel messages for a local database.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: onEvent(_:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Observe a list of events with a given channel id (optional).

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: isUnread
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: An observable isUnread state of the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: unreadCount
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Observe an unread count of messages in the channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: query(pagination:options:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Request for a channel data, e.g. messages, members, read states, etc

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: hide(for:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Hide the channel from queryChannels for the user until a message is added.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: show(for:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Removes the hidden status for a channel.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: send(message:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Send a new message or update with a given message.id.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: send(action:for:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Send a message action for a given ephemeral message.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: markRead()
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Mark messages in the channel as readed.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: deleteImage(url:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Delete an image with a given URL.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: deleteFile(url:)
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Delete a file with a given URL.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.abstract: Get the value if exists or return a default value.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:14StreamChatCo.abstract: Check if the web socket is connected.

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: callbackQueue
Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A request callback queue, default nil (some background thread).

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: stayConnectedInBackground
Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: When the app will go to the background, start a background task to stay connected for 5 min.

Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.abstract: Disconnect from Stream and reset the current user.

Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.abstract: Observe a list of events with a given channel type and id.
